verification.title: Artist Verification
verification.subtitle: Our process-based verification ensures every artwork on SoulHuman is genuinely created by human hands.
verification.whyVerifyDesc: In an era where AI can generate convincing images in seconds, we believe it's crucial to protect and celebrate authentic human creativity. Our verification process is designed to be thorough yet artist-friendly.
verification.reqSketchDesc: Upload preliminary sketches, rough drafts, or work-in-progress images that show the evolution of your artwork.
verification.reqTimelapseDesc: For digital artists: Provide screen recordings or timelapse videos of your creation process.
verification.reqProcessDesc: Document your creative process with photos showing your workspace, materials, and tools in use.
verification.pledgeIntro: All artists must agree to the following statement:
verification.pledgeText: "I confirm that this artwork is created entirely by me, a human, without the use of AI generation, AI-assisted image creation, or any generative models. I understand that violations will result in permanent removal from the platform."
verification.benefit1: Display the 'Human Verified' badge on all your artworks
verification.benefit2: Build trust with buyers who value authentic human art
verification.benefit3: Get featured in our curated collections
verification.benefit4: Access to commission requests from serious collectors
verification.benefit5: Join a community of verified human artists

policy.title: Anti-AI Policy
policy.subtitle: SoulHuman is committed to celebrating and protecting authentic human creativity.
policy.zeroToleranceDesc: SoulHuman maintains a strict policy against AI-generated content. Any artwork found to violate this policy will be immediately removed, and the artist will face a permanent ban from the platform.
policy.prohibited2: Images created using generative AI models (Midjourney, DALL-E, Stable Diffusion, etc.)
policy.prohibited3: Artwork that uses AI-generated base images, even if modified
policy.prohibited4: AI-assisted generation or enhancement tools that create content
policy.prohibited5: Artwork created by feeding prompts to any AI system
policy.prohibited6: Modifications or edits to AI-generated artwork
policy.allowed1: Reference photos for inspiration (but not AI-generated ones)
policy.allowed2: Digital tools for traditional creation (Photoshop, Procreate, etc.)
policy.allowed3: Basic photo editing (cropping, color correction of YOUR work)
policy.allowed4: Scans or photos of physical artwork
policy.allowed5: Digital painting and illustration created stroke-by-stroke
policy.enforcementDesc: Our verification process includes multiple layers of review:
policy.enforcement1Desc: Artists must provide sketches, work-in-progress images, or screen recordings.
policy.enforcement2Desc: Users can report suspected AI art for review.
policy.enforcement3Desc: Flagged content is reviewed by trained moderators.
policy.enforcement4Desc: We use various detection methods to identify AI-generated content.
policy.consequence4: Public listing in our violations registry (artist name only)
policy.contact: Have questions about our policy? Contact us at
